entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young wizard who has uncommon skill and power.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is guiding Harry on his journey.

relationships.description: Harry has a power that Voldemort does not have, which is the ability to love.
Dumbledore is guiding Harry on his journey and helping him understand his powers.
